REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2647 reute r f BC-LOUISIANA-LAND-<LLX> 03-20 0064

TEXT.TITLE: LOUISIANA LAND <LLX> ASSUMES INEXCO'S DEBT
TEXT.BODY: Louisiana Land and Exploration Co said it assumed the obligation to pay the principal and interest on the 8-1/2 pct convertible subordinated debentures due September 1, 2000 of Inexco Oil Co, a unit of Louisiana Land. Effective March 23, the debentures will be listed as the debentures of Louisiana Land, LLXOO. Reuter
